# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is an example of the `wrap_string` function:
```
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    words = split(str, " ")
    lines = Vector{String}()

    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= word
        current_line *= " "
    end

    push!(lines, current_line)

    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```
Here is an example of how to use the function:
```
julia> wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet", 10)
"Lorem ipsu\nm dolor s\nit ame\nt"
```
